TopicTitle: In VAB - How To Group Engines

Articles.Content:
In the image, I have selected (CTRL-LMB) six engines. Each was individually installed, not as a symmetry install.

What key do I push so they are a single icon with the number 6 (number of engines in group)?

NOTE: I am NOT referring to Action Groups.

Edited May 29, 2014 by Apollo13
You can't, there's no way to do that.

The only way to do what you are asking is to use symmetry. HOWEVER: If the engines are in the same stage and of the same type and not firing, when you go to the launchpad they will be grouped and you can do final staging adjustments there.
Thank you. I was hoping I was missing something. Alas, not.

Yeah, it sometimes seems a bit random whether the staging list groups engines or not. I can place an engine with 6-fold symmetry and get a set of 5 engines and a single engine in the staging.

You can always freely rearrange things anyway.
